data.text: Sister Rachel Valverde, we are honored to express our most sincere gratitude in regards to...

data.title: A SPECIAL THANKS TO OUR 1st LADY OF FTC
data.content:
Sister Rachel Valverde, we are honored to express our most sincere gratitude in regards to your great work as a pillar to this beautiful family, Fountain of Truth. Your life itself is a glimpse of glory that sheds light to those around you.

The fruit of the spirit has transcended nations, a smile, a message, an invitation, an advice, there are not only details, but rather are small seeds that give fruits on fertile soil.

Global Ministry “She” thanks your wise direction in every reunion, your leadership in every companionship and advice that you’ve given to every pastor’s wife, your endeavor in living our vision of making this a safe place and your mentorship to form us as leaders of this beautiful ministry.
